Address.label: Address
Address.value: 222 WEST LAS COLINAS BOULEVARD,SUITE 900N, IRVING, Texas, 75039-5421, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Celanese is one of the world's largest producers of acetic acid and its downstream derivative chemicals, which are used in various end markets, including coatings and adhesives. The company also produces specialty polymers used in the automotive, electronics, medical, and consumer end markets as well as cellulose derivatives used in cigarette filters.

value.name: Scott A. Richardson
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
